articles.title: Patriots placing key defensive standout Milton Williams on IR
articles.description:

articles.title: Television ratings rise right along with Patriots during stunning season of rejuvenation
articles.description:
Patriots broadcasts on CBS are averaging a 24.4 household rating and 72 share in the Boston market. That’s up 23 percent from last season.
